description.value:
You gain your mystery's initial revelation spell (@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Soul Siphon]{Soul Siphon}). Casting this spell progresses your @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.Oracular Curse]{Oracular Curse}. Use the minor curse from your mystery, but when you progress it again, instead of your mystery's moderate curse effect, you become @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Flat-Footed]{Flat-Footed} in addition to the effects of the minor curse.

If you don't have one, you gain a focus pool of 1 Focus Point. You can @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Refocus]{Refocus} by reconciling the conflicting nature of your mystery, which also reduces your curse to minor.

Minor Curse of Bones

Bones protrude through your skin and your flesh rots, combining with a stench of decay and an unearthly chill. Non-magical effects that would restore your Hit Points only grant you half as many HP as normal.

@Compendium[pf2e.feature-effects.Effect: Minor Bones Curse]{Effect: Minor Bones Curse}
